article_title: Sebelius, former Kansas governor, calls for Medicaid expansion, lower food sales tax
article_text:
TOPEKA — Former Kansas Gov. Kathleen Sebelius made a pitch Wednesday for expansion of Medicaid in Kansas, urged women to assume a more active role in politics and denounced escalation of a sales tax on food by the Republican-led Legislature and Gov. Sam Brownback.
